str2: And, even, also, namely.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From hupokrinomai; an actor under an assumed character, i.e. a dissembler
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From philos; to be a friend to (an individual or an object), i.e. Have affection for; specially, to kiss.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From sunago; an assemblage of persons; specially, a Jewish 'synagogue'; by analogy, a Christian church.
And, even, also, namely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A street, public square, broad way. Feminine of platus; a wide 'plat' or 'place', i.e. Open square.
A corner; met: a secret place. Probably akin to gonu; an angle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have in full, be far, it is enough. From apo and echo; to have out, i.e. Receive in full; to keep away, i.e. Be distant.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) pay, wages, salary, (b) reward, recompense, punishment. Apparently a primary word; pay for service, good or bad.
